sqlReaderQuery.value:
WITH CTE AS(

SELECT OWNER_NAME,
OWNER_ADDRESS,
OWNER_CITY,
OWNER_STATE,
OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
COUNTRY_CODE,
B_SOURCE_ID,
--ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY B_SOURCE_ID ORDER BY OWNER_NAME,OWNER_ADDRESS DESC) AS RNK
rank() over(partition by B_Source_ID order by ltrim(rtrim(OWNER_NAME))) as rnk
FROM  [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteOwner]
)
SELECT  DISTINCT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID,
      [OWNER_NAME] AS OWNER_NAME
      ,[OWNER_ADDRESS] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[OWNER_CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[OWNER_STATE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[OWNER_POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
	,'INITIALLOAD' as [B_PUBID]
	,'SiteOwner' AS B_CLASSNAME
	, B_Source_ID AS [B_SOURCEID]
       ,Country_Code as RAWCOUNTRY_CODE FROM CTE WHERE RNK=1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'Site Master Load'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
      @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[SITE_NAME] AS SITE_NAME
      ,[SITE_TYPE] AS SITE_TYPE
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) as ISACTIVE
      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION] AS SITE_DESCRIPTION
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] AS SITE_OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,[B_SOURCE_ID] AS B_SOURCEID
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE2] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE2
      ,[CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[STATE_CODE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE] AS RAWCOUNTRY_CODE
	  ,[LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_AREA]
      ,CAST(OPERATIONS_START_DATE AS DATE) AS OPERATIONS_START_DATE
      ,CAST(CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE AS DATE) AS CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE
      ,CONVERT(decimal(12,4),CONVERT(float,CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA)) AS CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA
	,'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
	,FS_SITE_OWNER as [FS_SITE_OWNER]
	,'INITIALLOAD' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
	,FP_WAREHOUSE_PARENT as [FP_WAREHOUSE_PARENT]
	,FS_WAREHOUSE_PARENT AS [FS_WAREHOUSE_PARENT]
  FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteMain]    
WHERE FS_SITE_OWNER IS NOT NULL AND COUNTRY_CODE in ('USA','United States') AND [B_SOURCE_ID] IS NOT NULL

SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[B_SOURCE_ID]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[SITE_TYPE]
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) AS ISACTIVE
      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION]
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE]
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1]
      ,[CITY]
      ,[STATE_CODE]
      ,[POSTAL_CODE]
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_AREA]
      ,CASE WHEN OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA='?' THEN NULL ELSE  CONVERT(decimal(16,4),  convert(float,replace([OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],',','') )) 
	  END AS OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA
      ,[FS_SITE_OWNER]
	  ,'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
  ,'INITIALLOAD' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
  FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteMainRDC] WHERE RNK=1

SELECT   @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
       ,FP_SITE_MAIN
      ,NEWID() AS [Site_Contact_ID]
      ,[CONTACT_FIRST_NAME]
      ,[CONTACT_LAST_NAME]
      ,[RAW_CONTACT_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_CONTACT_EMAIL]
      ,[SITE_CONTACT_TYPE]
      ,[FS_SITE_MAIN]
	,'SiteContact' as B_CLASSNAME
FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteContact]

value.value: @concat('Data Not Found from Date ',variables('ModifiedDateFrom'),' to Date ',variables('ModifiedDateTo'))
